alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 2:28PM CDT until April 13 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR PEMISCOT...SOUTHEASTERN DUNKLIN...NORTHWESTERN OBION AND LAKE COUNTIES... At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Steele, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Caruthersville, Portageville, Hayti, Steele, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Ridgely, Hayti Heights, Wardell, Bolton, Deering, Cottonwood Grove, Holland, Samburg, Bragg City, Pascola, Madie, Spout Springs, Lassiter Corner and Cates. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
